title: WE LOVE OUR PETS!! Great Community for Animal-Lovers!
posting_body: ['Location:', '1110 Garden Walk Blvd - College Park, GA 30349', 'Rental Information:', '$1350/Month | 1 Bedroom 1 Bath | 754 sq ft', 'Lease Terms:', '6-Month, 7-Month, 8-Month, 9-Month, 10-Month, 11-Month, 12-Month', 'More Information:', 'show contact info', 'What you’ll find in our community!', '− 24hr.', 'Emergency maintenance', '− Cabana', '− Condition very good', '− Controlled Access Gates', '− Corporate Housing', '− Courtyard', '− Fitness Center', '− Green and flowered areas', '− Grill', '− Laundry Facilities', '− Nature Trails', '− On-Site Maintenance', '− Organized Activities', '− Package Service', '− Property Manager on Site', '− Sports court (outside)', '− Two playground areas', '− Two tennis courts', '− Vintage Building', '− Walking/Biking Trails', 'Features in this apartment home!', '− Air conditioning - central air', '− Cable Ready', '− Carpet', '− Ceiling Fans', '− Dining Room', '− Dishwasher', '− Disposal', '− Fireplace - Wood Burning', '− Hardwood Floors', '− High Speed Internet Available', '− Patio/Balcony', '− Range w/Oven', '− Refrigerator w/Ice Maker', '− Smoke Free', '− Sunroom', '− Walk-In Closets', '− Washer/Dryer Connections in 2 & 3 BR', '− Wheelchair Accessible (Rooms)', '− Window Coverings', 'Call Gardenwood Apartments at', 'show contact info', "With a variety of floor plans to choose from, we're certain there's one that's just right for you.", 'Browse our one, two, and three bedroom floor plans!', 'Website:', '<URL>/', 'Pet Policy:', 'We welcome 2 pets per apartment home.', 'There is a $300 non-refundable pet fee for each pet.', 'The weight limit is 50 pounds per pet.', 'Breed restrictions apply.', 'Please contact leasing office for complete pet policy details.', 'Management:', 'Ventron Management', '*Price is subject to change without prior notice', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', 'B93409C17EA2415']
